mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM CRA_CHOUTI a ORDER BY a.CREATE_TIME DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CRA_CHOUTI( ID, COME_FROM, TITLE, SUMMARY, CONTENT, EXT_URL, PUBLISH_TIME, HEART, COMMENT, CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{comeFrom}, #{title}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{extUrl}, #{publishTime}, #{heart}, #{comment}, #{createTime} )
